nodes.text: Nysillin was a healing herb grown on Felucia and known to be harvested by Casiss and his farming community at the time of the Clone Wars. A band of pirates led by Hondo Ohnaka harassed the village into giving them the valuable crop, leading Casiss to hire a group of bounty hunters to drive off the pirates. Later, the Nuro Pirates led by Yorn Nuro started a nysillin farm, fighting against the Republic.

There is a discrepancy in the episode on what the plant was called. On entering the farm and seeing the plants, Obi-Wan Kenobi called it "nysillin," but Casiss called their work "sillum farming." It is possible that "sillum" is a slang term.
Another aspect is that in the episode Obi-Wan refers to Nysillin is "One of the most valuable crops in the galaxy" yet the farmer Casius refers to it as a "Meager trade"
